name: Laura Bailey
info:
• 简体中文名: 劳拉·贝莉
  • 别名: Elle Deets
  • 别名: 劳拉·道恩·贝莉
  • 别名: Laura Dawn Bailey
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1981年5月28日
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
detail: Laura Bailey is an American actress, voice actor, singer, line producer and ADR director. She voiced Dahlia Mason in Silent Hill: Shattered Memories, Angela Orosco and Claudia Wolf in the Silent Hill HD Collection, and various voices in Silent Hill: Book of Memories such as the rocker/goth protagonist and Katie Collins.
